en.start-message: Welcome to the TooGoodNotify bot! I'm here to help you get notified when TooGoodToGo magic bags are available. Use /help to see what I can do for you.
en.help-message:
Here's a list of commands you can use:

- /start: Start interacting with the bot
- /help: Show this help message
- /settings: Configure your language and notification preferences
- /register: Register your account to receive notifications
- /notifications_start: Start receiving notifications
- /notifications_stop: Stop receiving notifications
- /status: Check your notification status
- /about: Learn more about this bot
en.settings-message:
Settings:
You can configure your preferences here. Use /language to set your preferred language, and /notifications_start or /notifications_stop to control notifications.
en.notifications-start: Notifications are now enabled! üéâ You will receive alerts for TooGoodToGo offers in your area.
en.notifications-stop: Notifications have been turned off. You will no longer receive alerts.
en.about-message: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This bot is designed to help you stay updated on TooGoodToGo magic bags. Powered by the TooGoodToGo API and a dedicated server to provide you with timely alerts!
en.language-message: Your language has been set to {language}. Use /help if you need assistance.
en.register-failed: Failed to initiate credential refresh. Please try again.
en.register-pending: A verification email has been sent to your email address. Please click the link to authorize the update.
en.register-success: Your credentials have been successfully refreshed and updated!
en.register-timeout: The credential refresh process timed out. Please ensure you clicked the link in the verification email.
en.register-error: An error occurred while refreshing credentials.
